\section*{Acknowledgements}
We would like to thank P.K. Townsend and M.N.R. Wohlfarth for useful
correspondence, and J.X. Lu for valuable discussions. Most of the work was
done while the author was visiting the Interdisciplinary Center for
Theoretical Study at University of Science and Technology of China, whose
hospitality is gratefully acknowledged.
This work was also supported in part by Grants-in-Aid for Scientific Research
Nos. 12640270 and 02041.
